item.description:
2nd Annual ACIM Picnic

When: Saturday, June 19th

Where: Wickham Park (East Hartford/Manchester).
www.wickhampark.org
1329 Middle Turnpike West
Manchester, CT 06040-1805
(860) 528-0856

We will run it like a potluck rather than trying to grill there unless we have someone that is really motivated to do the grilling. Those who are interested can go on a nice hike. Wickham has a disc golf course that is a lot of fun. We have plenty of discs. Bring lawn chairs to relax.

It would be helpful if you can let me know what you will bring. Please call me at (860) 338-3922 if you have any questions. This is my cell so keep it handy the day of the picnic in case you have trouble finding us.
item.how_to_find_us: Check back to this website for details about where we will be meeting.

group.name: Connecticut A Course In Miracles Study Group

item.name: Annual Picnic, Wickham Park East Hartford
